duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing patient care and treatment in accordance with medical and nursing standards.
Collaborating with medical professionals to develop and implement patient care plans.
Monitoring and administering medication, and assessing patient responses.
Using healthcare technology for record-keeping and patient monitoring.
Responding to and managing emergency medical situations.
Supporting and educating patients and their families on healthcare options and treatment plans.

education_certification.credential: Diploma in Nursing or an ASN/BSN
Valid Registered Nurse license in the applicable state.
Additional certifications as required for specified areas.
Good verbal and written communication skills.
